title: Jenna Dewan is absolutely glowing as she covers up baby bump in overalls while grabbing a smoothie
text:
She just announced she is expecting her second child in late September.

And Jenna Dewan was healthy and glowing as she stepped out in LA on Monday for a smoothie with her daughter Everly, six.

The actress/dancer, 38, looked chic as she covered up her growing bump in overalls.

Chic mama: Jenna Dewan looked chic as she covered up her growing bump in overalls for a smoothie run in LA on Monday

The black overalls had wide legs that fell at her ankles.

She wore a short sleeve, white tee underneath the one piece ensemble.

For accessories, she carried a red cross-body bag that had a gold chain strap.

She left holding a very purple smoothie in her fresh silver manicured hand.

Overall look: The black overalls had wide legs that fell at her ankles. She wore a short sleeve, white tee underneath the one piece ensemble

Jenna also wore a thick black watch on her left wrist.

Flat black leather sandals and dark square sunglasses completed the comfortable but stylish ensemble.

The expecting mother looked amazing as she seemed to go makeup free with her hair down in a voluminous sleek look.

New for me:Jenna's relaxing outing comes as boyfriend Steve Kazee recently said he's finding her whole pregnancy 'mind-blowing'

Jenna's relaxing outing comes as boyfriend Steve Kazee recently said he's finding her whole pregnancy 'mind-blowing'.

The Tempting Fate actor is expecting his first child with the Step Up actress and he admits it has been an 'amazing' experience so far.

'It's mind-blowing, the whole thing,' he told Entertainment Tonight. 'Watching a child grow inside of a human has been the most amazing experience so far. It's good! I'm trying to stay calm, not panic and let it all happen.'

And the 43-year-old star is taking a year off work to spend time with Jenna throughout the pregnancy as he doesn't want to miss anything.

Announcement: She announced they were expecting their first child together late last month, she shares daughter Everly with ex-husband Channing Tatum

He added: 'I'm taking a year off. I just want to see all this process. This is my first child, so I just want to be there for Jenna, for the whole thing and that's going to be it. My next role is just dad and that's it! I don't want to miss any doctor's appointments.

'I don't want to miss any of the baby growing. I don't want to miss any of the morning sickness. I want to be there for all of it.'

Since meeting Steve, Jenna has been in 'the best place' and is now 'super excited' about expanding her family with her beau.

The insider added: 'Jenna is in the best place. Her relationship with Steve has really been so wonderful for her.

Time off: Steve said : 'I'm taking a year off. I just want to see all this process. This is my first child, so I just want to be there for Jenna

She is relaxed and sees the world in a healthier way ... Steve has made her realize that she is amazing the way she is. He is just a great guy for her. [Jenna] is super excited about having a baby with [Steve]. [She is] crazy in love with Steve and he is equally excited.'

Jenna and Steve announced they were expecting in late September.

Dewan also has a six-year-old daughter named Everly Tatum, whom she shares with her ex-husband, Channing Tatum, 39.

Jenna and the hunky Magic Mike star shocked their family, friends and fans when they announced their separation on Instagram in April last year.

The couple's split ended nearly nine years of marriage after they fell in love on the set of musical Step Up in 2006.
description:
Jenna Dewan was healthy and glowing as she stepped out in LA on Monday for a smoothie with her daughter Everly.
She looked chic as she covered up her growing bump in overalls.
